title: Bonus Episode: Sinead O'Connor is the Kassandra of Our Time, with Margaret Howie
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Sinead O'Connor is the Kassandra of Our Time, with Margaret Howie
description:
We're releasing this bonus episode from the Patreon vaults. Come subscribe to our Patreon and get content like this all the time! (Or, you know, on a semi-regular basis, we have jobs and so on.) Regular bonus episode co-host Margaret Howie joins Jessa to talk about the outspoken career of Sinead O'Connor, and how she has paid the price for that outspokenness. 

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
